name: WalkerSheep VS Glitch Master
description: WalkerSheep gets sucked into the glitch realm, a place between earth and nothing. WalkerSheep is forced to fight a glitched version of himself as well as a glitched version of Boyfriend. Fight back against the GlitchMaster in this new mod that includes 1 new week, 3 new songs, 2 cutcenes, 2 new enemys and more!
